Reviews.Title: what a steal
Reviews.Author: GAMER
Reviews.Content: Update 8/27/13Used this for a couple years now and it still works great. I transitioned this to a PC monitor and it works great. Never fails and super reliable. I have it connected via HDMI from my PC and it syncs with no issues. Plus the TV Tuner is nice and is cheaper than some Monitors without sound.Bought from costco for $179.99. Great gamer tv and the features are awesome. sound has a 5 band equalizer and the settings are great. 3 hdmi and other connections make this a very versatile hdtv. Setup was easy and comparable tv is $100 more.

Reviews.Title: NO DIGITAL CHANNELS WORK
Reviews.Author: Mike L
Reviews.Content: All HD Channels don't work.It would show the HD Channel's for around 30 seconds, then shut off.I know it is not the cable provider, because I tested it at different locations, and other TV's that I have work.

Reviews.Title: Good LED TV for the price!
Reviews.Author: onesolo
Reviews.Content: Picture is really good. Nice color.The sound is good and strong too. It comes with an equalizer.Nice remote.I would recommend this TV to anyone who is on a budget, and to be honest, is does not get much better than this.

Reviews.Title: Good cheap TV
Reviews.Author: LHH
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is very washed out.  But, I wanted a cheap TV for a guest room and this works.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Joel Zwerman
Reviews.Content: The clarity and resolution are excellent.  Every time I view this TV I "kvell" at how beatiful the picture is.  I highly recommend this TV.

Reviews.Title: customer service nightmare
Reviews.Author: thprov
Reviews.Content: Bought this tv (sc24lmubu4fr) on 12/31/11 from Tigerdirect, received it 01/06/12.  Set it up, ran it briefly and over the next month ran it about 4 hours.  Then dead.  First customer "service" told me to ship at my expense, after my squawking they offered "reduced price shipping." On, 2/7/12, a free shipping label was approved.  Six outgoing emails, three incoming emails, three calls to the outsourced call center and still waiting for a shipping label.  Flat refusal to put me in touch with US support. This company is committing commercial suicide in the US.  Buy at your peril!

Reviews.Title: Nice Picture
Reviews.Author: Kevin D. Flanagan
Reviews.Content: The only complaint I have is that when I first turn it on, it takes several minutes for the picture to illuminate.
